name: async-javascript-callbacks-and-promises-challenge
description: - install the dependecies where you see a package.json: `npm install` - run `node file.js` - have a look on this guide: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/Server-side/Express_Nodejs/development_environment - and this tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHDhaSSKmB0 - the project contains 3 folders, each of them representing a small example or challenge
